1100101110000110 1111010100000110 1 -> sum: 1100000010001101, cout: 1

1110111000100100 1110001101101000 0 -> sum: 1101000110001100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
